# YSI profiles

## Metadata

```{r uvs, eval = TRUE}
uvs_meta <- readxl::read_xlsx(file.path(exp_path, 
                                        paste0("data/primary/raw/fish/",
                                               exp_id,
                                               "_fish_fieldbook_AMF.xlsx"))) |> 
  as_tibble()

uvs_meta <- uvs_meta |> 
  mutate(expedition = exp_id, 
         uvs_id = ps_station_id,
         date = lubridate::dmy(dd_mm_yyyy),
         local_time = hms::as_hms(local_time)) |> 
  select(expedition,  uvs_id, location, date, local_time, lat, lon, habitat, exposure, alternative_site_id, everything(), -dd_mm_yyyy, -sand_number, -sand_m, -ps_station_id, -team_lead)
```

```{r ysi_clean, eval = TRUE, include = T}
ysi_fieldbook <- readxl::read_xlsx(file.path(exp_path, 
                                        paste0("data/primary/raw/ysi/",
                                               exp_id,
                                               "_ysi_fieldbook.xlsx"))) |> 
  as_tibble() |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  rename(paired_site_id = ps_station_id) |> 
  mutate(expedition = exp_id, 
         method = "YSI probe",
         team_lead = "Alan Friedlander",
         date = lubridate::ymd(date_corrected),
         local_time =  hms::as_hms(time_corrected))
  
ysi_meta <- ysi_fieldbook |> 
  group_by(expedition, method, team_lead, date, paired_site_id) |> 
  summarize(local_time = first(local_time)) |> 
  ungroup() |> 
  mutate( ps_site_id = paste(paste0(exp_id, "_ysi"), 
                             formatC(row_number(), width = 2, flag = 0),
                             sep = "_")) |> 
  select(expedition, method, ps_site_id, date, everything()) |> 
  left_join(uvs_meta |> 
              select(uvs_id, location, habitat, exposure, lat, lon), 
            by = c("paired_site_id" = "uvs_id")) |> 
  select(expedition, method, ps_site_id, location, date, local_time, lat, lon, 
         habitat, exposure, paired_site_id, team_lead)
```

```{r ysi_map, eval = TRUE, include = T}
tmp <- ysi_meta |> 
  filter(!is.na(lat)) |> 
  st_as_sf(coords = c("lon", "lat"), crs = 4326) |> 
  group_by(method, ps_site_id, location, habitat, exposure, geometry) 

mapview::mapview(tmp,
                 zcol = c(exposure = "exposure"), 
                 legend = TRUE,
                 col.regions = paletteer_d("wesanderson::Darjeeling1", 3),
                 map.types = c("Esri.WorldImagery"),
                 layer.name = "exposure",
                 popup = leafpop::popupTable(tmp,
                                      zcol = c("method",
                                               "ps_site_id",
                                               "location",
                                               "habitat",
                                               "exposure")))
```

```{r ysi_table, eval = TRUE, include = T}
ysi_meta |> 
  group_by(location, exposure, habitat) |> 
  summarize(n_stations = n_distinct(ps_site_id)) |> 
  ungroup() |> 
  group_by(location) |> 
  gt::gt(rowname_col = "habitat", groupname_col = "location") |> 
  summary_rows(columns  = contains("n_"),
               fns = list(list(label = md("**Total**"), fn = "sum")),
               fmt = ~ fmt_number(., decimals = 0, use_seps = FALSE)) |> 
  grand_summary_rows(columns  = contains("n_"),
                     fns = list(list(label = md("**Grand total**"), fn = "sum")),
                     fmt = ~ fmt_number(., decimals = 0, use_seps = FALSE)) |> 
    tab_header(title = "Number of YSI profiles per location, habitat, and exposure") |>
  opt_align_table_header(align = "left") |> 
  tab_style(locations = cells_summary(),
            style = cell_fill(color = "lightblue" |> adjust_luminance(steps = +1))) |> 
  tab_style(locations = cells_grand_summary(),
            style = cell_fill(color = "lightblue" |> adjust_luminance(steps = +2))) |> 
    tab_options(ihtml.use_compact_mode = TRUE,
              data_row.padding = px(5)) |> 
  cols_label_with(fn = ~str_replace(.x, "n_", "# ") |> 
                    str_to_title()) 
```


```{r ysi_export, eval = F}

                fields = as_bq_fields(ysi_meta))

bigrquery::bq_table_upload(paste0("pristine-seas.metadata.",exp_id, "_ysi"), 
                           values = ysi_meta, fields = ysi_meta)
```
